scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:chrome && npm run build:firefox && npm run build:edge && npm run build:opera
scripts.build:chrome: npm run compile:chrome && npm run package:chrome
scripts.build:firefox: npm run compile:firefox && npm run package:firefox
scripts.build:edge: npm run compile:edge && npm run package:edge
scripts.build:opera: npm run compile:opera && npm run package:opera
scripts.compile:chrome: rimraf build/chrome && cross-env NODE_ENV=production BROWSER=chrome webpack --config webpack.config.js
scripts.compile:firefox: rimraf build/firefox && cross-env NODE_ENV=production BROWSER=firefox webpack --config webpack.config.js
scripts.compile:edge: rimraf build/edge && cross-env NODE_ENV=production BROWSER=edge webpack --config webpack.config.js
scripts.compile:opera: rimraf build/opera && cross-env NODE_ENV=production BROWSER=opera webpack --config webpack.config.js
scripts.package:chrome: mkdirp dist && cd build && cd chrome && bestzip ../../dist/vscreenshot-assistant-chrome.zip *
scripts.package:firefox: mkdirp dist && cd build && cd firefox && bestzip ../../dist/vscreenshot-assistant-firefox.zip *
scripts.package:edge: mkdirp dist && cd build && cd edge && bestzip ../../dist/vscreenshot-assistant-edge.zip *
scripts.package:opera: mkdirp dist && cd build && cd opera && bestzip ../../dist/vscreenshot-assistant-opera.zip *
scripts.archive: mkdirp dist && git archive HEAD --format zip -o dist/archive.zip
